title: Director of Southwest Adult High School
status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (239 day calendar)EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCEMaster's degree in Education, with four to six years' classroom instruction and related educational administration experience and/or training.CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONSAn active Utah School Leadership License is required for this position.The salary for this position is assigned to lane 3 of the AA Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please selet the following linkAA Salary Schedule.Applicants will be contacted via email on January 6, 2026 regarding interview eligibility.  In-Person interviews will be held on January 9, 2026.Attachment(s):Director of SWHS.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
